column1: Given the choice of anyone in the world, who would you want to have as a dinner guest?
Would you like to be famous? If so in what way?
What would you constitute a 'perfect' day for you?
When did you last sing to yourself or to someone else?
Do you have a secret hunch on how you will die?
Name three thinks you have in common with one of the other people beside you?
For what are you grateful in your life do you feel most grateful?
Take five minutes and tell you life story in as much detail as possible (warn the person when they have 1 minute left)
If you could change anything about the way you were raised, what would it be?
If you could wake up tomorrow having gained one quality or ability, what would it be?
